name: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate
summary: Your knowledge of halcyon magic increases.
description:
Your knowledge of halcyon magic increases. You gain two common 2nd-level halcyon spells and two 3rd-level halcyon spells. You also gain a 2nd-level halcyon spell slot and a 3rd-level halcyon spell slot. These and all future halcyon spell slots work like the 1st-level halcyon spell slot you gained from Halcyon Speaker Dedication.Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate Leads To...

Flexible Halcyon Spellcasting, Halcyon Spellcasting Adept, Synergistic SpellTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
